benchmark_details.name: LHMKE (Large-scale Holistic Multi-subject Knowledge Evaluation)
benchmark_details.overview: LHMKE is designed to provide a comprehensive evaluation of the knowledge acquisition capabilities of Chinese LLMs, encompassing 10,465 questions across 75 tasks covering 30 subjects, including both objective and subjective questions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate Chinese LLMs across a diverse range of question types and subjects, spanning from elementary school to professional certifications.

data.source: Questions are sourced from realistic standard exams in the Chinese educational system, manually collected online.
data.annotation: Questions are collected from standardized exams and categorized into objective and subjective types.

methodology.calculation: Metrics for objective questions are calculated based on accuracy, while subjective questions are evaluated using GPT-4 as an evaluator.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is measured by comparing LLM outputs to reference answers, with scores indicating the correctness of responses.
methodology.validation: Evaluations conducted across various Chinese LLMs to ensure their performance is rigorously tested.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data in LHMKE are collected from public sources and scrutinized to exclude examples with ethical concerns.
